name: Oven Barbecued Beef Brisket II
author: MARCIA ELLIS
summary: Extremely easy recipe which is my family's favorite!  Can be done in the oven or crock pot.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola-flavored carbonated beverage
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle chile sauce
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
In a roasting pan, place brisket fat side up
In a small bowl, combine cola beverage, onion soup mix, and chile sauce
Pour chile sauce mixture over brisket
Cover, and bake in preheated oven for 3 to 4 hours
Uncover the brisket during the last hour of cooking
